question: Last month, you travelled to another city. You told a friend who lives in the city that youwould meet them, but you did not. Write a letter to this friend. In your letter apologise for not meeting him/her explain why you did not contact him/her earlier suggest a time and place to meet in the future
text: Hope this letter of mine finds you in good health and in high spirits. I am sorry that I could not meet you in Delhi as the business meeting went too long and later I was stuck in the traffic.

Moreover, my phone's battery also went off and I did not remember your new phone number. Even though when I got free from my meeting I tried to call you multiple times but your phone was unreachable. Later, I got busy with packing and collecting things for my home and I had to leave to catch my train before the rush hours.

I am again very sorry  and I will make up for this mistake. There will be another get-together by my company in the next month and I will be reaching Delhi 2 days before. This time I will organise a movie dinner night at our favourite place for compensation.
